text: Tennessee gained three seats in reapportionment following the 1820 United States Census. Tennessee elected its members August 7–8, 1823, after the term began but before the new Congress convened. {| class=wikitable |- ! rowspan=2 | District ! colspan=3 | Incumbent ! colspan=2 | This race |- !
